description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\Storage\Business\StorageFacade::get()()` is using an invalid return type `mixed` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `text` in method `Spryker\Zed\Storage\Dependency\Service\StorageToUtilSanitizeServiceBridge::escapeHtml()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `double` in method `Spryker\Zed\Storage\Dependency\Service\StorageToUtilSanitizeServiceBridge::escapeHtml()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `charset` in method `Spryker\Zed\Storage\Dependency\Service\StorageToUtilSanitizeServiceBridge::escapeHtml()`.
